notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Guyana}} Possession of {{cvt|15|g|frac=2}} or over can result in charges of drug trafficking.<ref name="stabroeknews1">{{cite web |url=http://www.stabroeknews.com/2015/news/stories/12/04/rastafarian-community-protests-unjust-marijuana-laws/ |title=Rastafarian community protests against 'unjust' marijuana laws |publisher=Stabroek News |date=4 December 2015 |access-date=6 December 2015 |archive-date=5 September 2017 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170905185119/https://www.stabroeknews.com/2015/news/stories/12/04/rastafarian-community-protests-unjust-marijuana-laws/ |url-status=live }}</ref>
